segments.text: Could you cover for me on Tuesday ? I'm not coming back until Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're going to the beach for the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Just some fun in the sun . We really need to get away and relax for a few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , don't worry . I ’ ll take care of the business for you . Have fun !
segments.speaker: S2
